name: Assemble: Legendary Randomizer
description:
Quickly generate the setup for your next game of Legendary: A Marvel Deck Building Game.

FEATURES:

• Randomly selects schemes, mastermind, henchmen, villains and heroes.
• Easy filtering of specific cards, expansions or teams.
• Provides details of scheme specific setup instructions
• Save and load setups
• Supports all expansions.
• Supports setups for 1-5 players.
• Supports all difficulty levels and advanced solo mode.
• Supports a Mastermind player.
• Create custom cards.
• Keyword reference
